data.lyric:
[ti:BLOW]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Chris Stapleton/Bruno Mars]
[al:BLOW]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]BLOW - Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)/Chris Stapleton/Bruno Mars (布鲁诺·马尔斯)
[00:11.08]Composed by：Bard McNamee/Brody Brown/Bruno Mars/Chris Stapleton/Ed Sheeran/Frank Rogers/Greg McKee/J.T. Cure
[00:22.16]Feeling like a bullet
[00:24.81]Jumping outta gun
[00:27.27]I'm feeling like a winner
[00:29.84]I feel like I'm the one
[00:32.41]You're doing something to me
[00:35.09]You're doing something strange
[00:37.65]Well jump back talk to me woman
[00:40.13]You make me want to make a baby baby
[00:53.34]Supernatural woman
[00:55.86]Supernatural freak
[00:58.48]Don't know what you're doing
[01:01.13]Got me feeling weak
[01:02.46]Oh I wanna call you fever baby
[01:06.69]You can set a fire on me
[01:08.86]Hot d**n pop it like a pistol mama
[01:11.35]You got me down on my knees begging please
[01:13.49]I'm coming baby I'm coming for you hey
[01:19.60]Locked loaded shoot my shot tonight
[01:25.29]I'm coming baby I'm coming for you
[01:30.04]Pull my trigger let me blow your mind
[01:45.11]You red leather rocket
[01:47.72]You little foxy queen
[01:50.44]Everybody's watching
[01:53.12]Pretty little thing
[01:54.49]Baby tell me what's your fantasy
[01:57.39]Come closer let's talk about it
[01:59.85]You want white lines in a limousine
[02:02.73]Whipped cream and everything in between yeah
[02:05.53]I'm coming baby I'm coming for you yeah
[02:11.50]Locked loaded shoot my shot tonight
[02:17.23]I'm coming baby I'm coming for you
[02:21.84]Pull my trigger let me blow your mind
[02:25.72]I'm coming baby
[02:47.20]I'm coming baby I'm coming for you yeah
[02:53.01]Locked loaded shoot my shot tonight
[02:58.73]I'm coming baby I'm coming for you
[03:03.38]Pull my trigger let me blow your mind oh
data.trans:
[ti:BLOW]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Chris Stapleton/Bruno Mars]
[al:BLOW]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:11.08]//
[00:22.16]感觉自己像是颗
[00:24.81]跳脱弹夹的子弹
[00:27.27]感觉自己像是卫冕赢家
[00:29.84]感觉自己像是独一无二
[00:32.41]你对我来说是特别的存在
[00:35.09]无与伦比的特别
[00:37.65]欣然接受我吧 跟我聊聊吧 女士
[00:40.13]你让我不禁使你变成
[00:53.34]无与伦比的女士
[00:55.86]不同凡响的女人
[00:58.48]难道你还不清楚你的所作所为
[01:01.13]已让我无力招架
[01:02.46]我多想说你就是我悸动的原因
[01:06.69]是你点燃我心底的激情爱火
[01:08.86]出乎意料 就这样“擦枪走火”了
[01:11.35]你让我不禁虔诚祈祷
[01:13.49]我为你而来 为你而来
[01:19.60]枪机闭锁 子弹上膛 今夜直击我的目标
[01:25.29]我为你而来 为你而来
[01:30.04]我扣动扳机 就让我直击你的心
[01:45.11]烈焰红唇致命诱惑的你
[01:47.72]你就是高高在上的女王
[01:50.44]众人关注的焦点
[01:53.12]魅惑可爱如你
[01:54.49]亲爱的 就告诉我你心底的想法
[01:57.39]靠近一些 让我们好好聊聊
[01:59.85]你希望在豪车里品尝顶级好货
[02:02.73]还有其他美味 感受各种美好
[02:05.53]我为你而来 为你而来
[02:11.50]枪机闭锁 子弹上膛 今夜直击我的目标
[02:17.23]我为你而来 为你而来
[02:21.84]我扣动扳机 就让我直击你的心
[02:25.72]我为你而来
[02:47.20]我为你而来 为你而来
[02:53.01]枪机闭锁 子弹上膛 今夜直击我的目标
[02:58.73]我为你而来 为你而来
[03:03.38]我扣动扳机 就让我直击你的心
